an10.63:1.1: “Ye keci, bhikkhave, mayi nittham gata sabbe te ditthisampanna.
an10.63:1.2: Tesam ditthisampannanam pancannam idha nittha, pancannam idha vihaya nittha.
an10.63:1.4: Sattakkhattuparamassa, kolankolassa, ekabijissa, sakadagamissa, yo ca dittheva dhamme araha—
an10.63:1.7: Antaraparinibbayissa, upahaccaparinibbayissa, asankharaparinibbayissa, sasankharaparinibbayissa, uddhamsotassa akanitthagamino—
an10.63:1.9: Ye keci, bhikkhave, mayi nittham gata, sabbe te ditthisampanna.
an10.63:1.10: Tesam ditthisampannanam imesam pancannam idha nittha, imesam pancannam idha vihaya nittha”ti.
